name: Jane Wyman
spouse: '''Ernest Eugene Wyman''' (1933–1935) (divorced), '''Myron Futterman''' (1937–1938) (divorced), Ronald Reagan (1940–1948) (divorced), '''Fred Karger''' (1952–1954,1961-1965) (Twice divorced)
children: Maureen Reagan (1941–2001) ,  Michael Reagan (born in 1945) ,  '''Christine Reagan''' (1947-1947)
goldenglobeawards: '''Best Actress - Motion Picture Drama''', 1949 ''Johnny Belinda'', 1952 ''The Blue Veil'' ,  '''Best Actress - Drama Series''', 1983 ''Falcon Crest''
